replies.bodyText:
I didn't think of a way to do that. ValidationDriver does not give a method related to XMLReader.
I thought reusing InputSource, but it's not intended to be reused:

so applications should not attempt to re-use such streams after they have been handed to a parser.

https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/org/xml/sax/InputSource.html#setPublicId(java.lang.String)
